entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:08 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
